content:
Hi ,

I'm trying to run the mapping rule on https://www.hl7.org/fhir/patient-version-maps.html, which imports "http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureMap/*3to4", but my app shows error : Unable to find map(s) for http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureMap/*3to4, where can I find this map? Thanks for help in advance.
Hi! Did you post the http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureMap/*3to4 onto the FHIR Server, before you ran the transformation?
